author: Baha'u'llah
source_text:
(٤١) ﴿ يَا ابْنَ الإِنْسانِ ﴾
عَظِّمْ أَمْرِي لأُظْهِرَ عَلَيْكَ مِنْ أَسْرارِ العِظَمِ، وَأُشْرِقَ عَلَيْكَ بِأَنْوارِ الْقِدَمِ.
translation:
(41) O SON OF MAN!
Magnify My cause that I may reveal unto thee the mysteries of My greatness and shine upon thee with the light of eternity.
